item.title: The whole of lannsdown road cycleway is full of pot holes and bumps. This is dangerous for pedestrians as cyclist swerve to avoid craked pavement and cyclists at risk of injury from falls and punctures., 27th September
item.description:
Whole of Lansdown rd A40 cycleway. Is this due to be updated as it joins the new cycle path to Gloucester? The new cycle route is great....be really good to have a better path after TGI Friday....its slow and dangerous. Easier to cycle on the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 64, Lansdown Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 4 potholes in a row, 27th September
item.description:
The road is bad either side so if you try to avoid the 4 potholes in a row you hit the other piece of rough road or if you try to avoid them the other side it pushes you onto the other side of the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury

item.title: Road flooding, 27th September
item.description:
Whenever we get heavy rain our street floods. The gulleys need cleaning more often as the leaves and sludge from other streets end up in our drains which in turn blocks them. My partners car has unfortunately been affected this time and if it happens again you will be held fully responsible. This is a service we pay for with our council tax.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Gristmill Close, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 100metre long, 35-40cm wide and 15cm deep pothole around a gulley., 27th September
item.description:
100metre long, 35-40cm wide and 15cm deep pothole around a gulley. No way to avoid as a cyclist or motorcyclist. Once wheel is in this defect, it will be difficult to get out, and the direction it will take the wheel in is straight into the gulley.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Andoversford, Cotswold
